name: socialpda
overview:
socialpda.com is a social networking site acts as a central hub for online communication. Linking all of their online social media accounts in one place. With socialpda, users receive an unprecedented access to exclusive discounts and promotional codes from top retail merchants! Users also create wish lists of desired products, which are visible to your network and sent as gift recommendations to your friends as important dates approach. The days of guessing what someoneâ€™s perfect gift might be are official over!

Each time a user signs on to their socialpda page, the system tracks areas of interest then automatically customizes their experience based on those statistics. So if you are a Raiders fan who loves classical music and Prada shoes, socialpda will notify you of related products and suggest new friends who have similar interest. Socialpda makes it easier than ever to connect with those who matter most to you. Each user profile includes a â€œWish Listâ€ feature made up of items that person has selected. As significant dates and holidays approach, those wish list items are suggested to friends in their network as gift ideas, and the best part is that recommendations often also include special discounts on the items as well.
